data.name: Dying Light 2 Stay Human:  Chicken Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Become a one-of-a-kind angry bird.
It’s time to shake a tail feather and establish a new pecking order in The City. As a chicken that fears no one, you have to break some bad eggs to make an omelet. Use a claw that can cut and scratch your enemies until they become a chicken-hearted mess. And if someone dares to doubt your ability to fly, prove them wrong by taking it to the skies with a featherweight paraglider.

The bundle contains:
  • Rooster Suit — wear this outfit, and all of your enemies will chicken out when facing you!
  • Chicken Claw — cut, scratch, and slice your foes like the true cocky rooster you are, with a bleeding effect on top of that!
  • Chicken Wing — why did the chicken jump off the roof? Well, to soar through the skies with this new paraglider skin.

* Fantastic soundtrack
* Christmas animated backgrounds

data.name: Go Alone
data.detailed_description:
Go Alone is a pixel art soulslike metroidvania adventure with magical ranged attacks and fast-paced combat.

Main features:

  • Classic metroidvania level design and moves with RPG and souslike elements.
  • Maps filled with tons of secrets and powers. Find and equip randomly generated spells!
  • Each journey is different. Choose your spells! The approach strategy is yours to decide.
  • Cast your magical journey through powerful bosses.
  • Explore 5 different atmospheric biomes, all with their enemies and ancient lore.

data.name: Vasilisa and Baba Yaga
data.detailed_description:
A spooky adventure where Vasilisa's journey and service to Baba Yaga consist of a series of mini-games with a variety of gameplay mechanics.

You as the fairytale character will accompany Vasilisa and her doll on their journey, will overcome obstacles that separate the world of the living from the world of the dead, complete the mission from the terrible Baba Yaga so as to prove that you are worthy of her favour and will finally be granted the gift of fire.


On your way you will encounter:

Сombat missions:
• fight petty evil spirits
• defeat the lord of the river Vodyanoy, lord of the swamp Bolotnik and lord of the forest Leshy (defeat the lords of the river, swamp and forest: Vodyanoy, Bolotnik and Leshy)
• prevail against the cruel stepmother

Household chores
• wash a mountain of dishes
• do a pile of laundry
• tidy up Baba Yaga's hut
• prepare the dough and bake some pirogi

Tasks to test attentiveness
• escape the fog
• successfully leave the forest
• do not get lost in the algae

Tasks to test dexterity
• sneak past a sleeping Vodyanoy without being caught
• creep quietly past Bolotnik without being found
• escape detection by Leshy
• flee From Baba Yaga

• The game is based on unadapted versions of fairytales and folktales with elements of what is perceived in modern culture as horror.

• The narrator reads the tale in a South Russian dialect. The story is told in the same manner as in Russian villages.

• The soundtrack is an original piece based on folk songs from the central and southern parts of Russia.

• The built-in encyclopaedia of folk tale characters, demonic creatures, household items, customs and rituals was compiled with the help of a consulting folklorist.

data.name: Taoism
data.detailed_description:
Background

The Luo Nan Kingdom was founded near the Luo River, flourishing for over a hundred years.

One day, a strange plague broke out. The deceased turned into evil spirits, causing further losses. The TianYi Taoism arrived on the scene and started hunting evil spirits, saving people’s lives. In the next 10 years, the TianYi Taoism wielded the scepter and its temples were constructed everywhere in Luo Nan. Still, the competition among various forces, as well as the invasion of evil Taoists and ghosts, had made people's lives very difficult…

In this game, you’ll play as different roles to know their clinging and solve their issues. Meanwhile, you need to clear out the mist to find the secrets hidden under the capital of Luo Nan in the past 10 years.

The Unique Gameplay and Settings

  • The basis of the two core rules of this game is Hunyuan Compass, referring to the original Eight Trigrams circular card field made by China's Fengshui.
  • There will be collisions between Yin and Yang, fulfillment between two sides of Yang. Use this setting to strike a surprise move to score success.
  • The special combat system, Huayuan, can change Yin and Yang. This might give you a chance to snatch a victory out of defeat.
  • Expand and form your card decks as you explore this game. Various creative gameplay and stunning effects will come out of the strategic combos of your cards.

A World with Chinese Traditional Ink Painting Style and Mythical Tales

The game’s worldview is based on the Chinese mythical tales like Strange Tales from a Chinese Studio, Stories of Immortals.

Substantial Contents and Game Plots

  • Various different enemies and puissant boss are waiting ahead. Fight against their strange decks of cards and spells, just blaze your trail through them!
  • There’s a mysterious store on your way up. Don’t forget to go in and exchange more types of cards and other powerful gears with the beautiful hostess.
  • Each card that comes with a token forms a part of the protagonist's story, and the mystery will gradually be solved.

The Places Awaiting to Be Explored Along with Adventure Full of Surprising Encounters

  • You’ll be in the Luo Nan Kingdom where is shrouded with mist. Just travel freely and move towards the truth in this dangerous and mysterious land.
  • You’ll face different choices on different roads. Every round of game will start a new exploring direction that fills your journey with surprises and unknown.
  • In certain areas, you might receive some special gears and encounter some fortuitous incidents.

Currently, the game is in its rapid development. We would love to hear your advices on our work!
Please join our Discord: https://discord.gg/fyZhvJmSgG

data.name: No Crime
data.detailed_description:
No Crime is a suspense puzzle game. The story takes place in a Chinatown in a country in South East Asia. Start from a drug case, follow private detective Sui Feng to discover a mysterious complexion full of conspiracy, overcome his intermittent amnesia, and avenge for his love…Can you find out the real culprit through fragments of memories?

About this game
  • No Crime’s story takes place in a Chinatown somewhere in Southeast Asia around 2001. A private detective Sui Feng was attacked when investigating a drug case with police. His girlfriend Arya blocked a knife for him and died, and Sui Feng was seriously wounded in the head. Since then, Sui Feng suffered from intermittent amnesia…When all the memories turned into pieces, sober up and find the truth will be one of the biggest challenges here.
  • In this game, you will follow the steps of the protagonist to clear up fogs of confusion and uncover the truth.
  • The cases are all full of suspense, every character in the game have different standpoints and motives. When the lure of profits strikes, can you see through and break free from it?

Game Features
  • The dominant tone of this game is more than simple color cartoon. You will experience strange and changeful atmosphere here, as the story unfolds slowly.
  • There are no jump scares from ghosts in this game, still, suspense and tension will be in your exploring journey, along with low and deep sounds and chanting of scriptures.
  • The unique Southeast Asian Chinatown flavor, strange but familiar folk culture, and special equipment in the millennium will be credit cookies who once were in your memories, waiting for you to discover.
  • Game scenes that can be smoothly explored and well-designed clues present a fine combination of challenges and enjoyment.
  • The game puzzles are designed in a close correlation with the story, so as to purse an immersive experience for players.

data.name: Glimpse
data.detailed_description:
GLIMPSE - DEVELOPMENT STATE

Prologue: Coming Soon
Chapter 1: Active Development
Chapter 2-6: Preproduction


Glimpse: Prologue

To give potential customers a chance to try it out, we have released Glimpse: Prologue as a free-to-play version. Our goal is to ensure that you'll find the game enjoyable before you make a purchase.


About the Game

After a dimensional transporter renders The Girl and her siblings obsolete, they must flee from The Company that created them in this gripping alternate 1980s timeline thriller.

Glimpse is a gripping sci-fi adventure game set in an alternate version of the 1980s. You start the game as The Girl who is on the run from The Company - the organization that created her and trained her. As she tries to survive while being hunted across dimensions, you'll unravel the story of how she ended up in this life-threatening situation.

Through the experiences of three different characters, you'll be immersed in a dramatic and atmospheric story-driven adventure. The game is filled with visual storytelling, challenging you with item-based puzzles that require lateral thinking, stealth mechanics to evade your foes, and traversal mechanics that give you the freedom to explore your environment.

Experience a gritty and tense world where danger lurks around every corner. Will you be able to escape The Company and uncover the truth of what happened? Play Glimpse to find out.

data.name: Run On Home
data.detailed_description:
First One!

This is my first solo published game. The code was written completely by me and I will prepare a package that can be purchased through the Unity Asset Store if anyone want's to use this system to build their own 2.5D Platformer.


About the Game

Can you get this guy home safely after his Uber left him stranded in Murder City? This short story of horror and survival will have you shaking in your boots as you race your way home without getting caught by an evil Demon. Everything in this world wants this guy dead and it's up to you to help him reach his destination. In this game the player has to use their platforming skills to get this random guy home. You'll come across puzzles/obstacles, and hostiles that want to put you in the dirt. On top of all of that, the player must avoid capture from a demon named Blamo. There are many paths to the end and a total of 4 different endings.

data.name: Chests, City, Clicker
data.detailed_description:
Chests, City, Clicker allows you to open chests, build a city and click.
What more do you need?
Probably a second monitor so as not to get bored.

In this game, you can build and upgrade more buildings to expand your city!
There are no wrong decisions, whatever you do - you will get even richer!
Don't wait, just click!

The game includes:
- 17 characters with their own short story
- 4 buildings
- Shop with changing offers
- Chests everywhere (instant gratification)
- Scalable quests

If you have nothing to do with your time, this is the perfect game for you!

data.name: MemoryWonderland:Bond
data.detailed_description:
Story background:

The departed always leave behind their unfulfilled wishes, while the living always pray for their peace. Even when separated by two worlds, are they willing to cut off this bond?
Why not transform into a butterfly and enter the world of death, to see each other's memories of the heart and to see if the bond that you both think cannot be cut off is really as firm as you think in your heart?
Realm of Memories, a journey of death game. Are you... ready?
by Alice


Game Features:

Maze exploration:
In the game, players will enter various well-designed mazes, and must carefully observe, solve puzzles, crack mechanisms, and engage in strategic battles with monsters in order to gradually explore the secrets of the maze and find a way out.


Strategic puzzle solving:
In the game, players must make use of the costumes and skills they have collected, combined with the different maze puzzles or monster abilities, in order to solve problems successfully. This requires players to have strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities, challenging themselves and improving their gaming level.


Rich collection elements:
Players can collect various elements, including cards, memory fragments, costumes, scene scrolls, and tree spirits, each of which will provide certain help to the protagonist in the maze exploration. Collecting all these elements not only helps players to better understand the game world, but also makes their gaming experience richer and more colorful.


Unique narrative approach:
The game's story is not only guided by the main storyline, but also includes memory fragments discovered in the maze. These fragments are presented to the player in the form of black and white animations, gradually revealing the story of the game. By collecting memory fragments, players will better understand the game background and characters, making the game more rich and interesting.

data.name: CORR
data.detailed_description:
CORR is a DIFFICULT Souls-lite Boss Rush Action RPG where you Run-n-Gun & Hack-n-Dash your way through challenging boss encounters. To endure the strange, dark, and bizarre world of CORR, level up and customize your warrior build with berserk powers, tonics, talismans, and more.

COMBAT:

  • I-frame dashes.
  • Stamina/energy management.
  • Visceral melee & gunplay combat.

BOSS FIGHTS:

  • Be prepared to face CORR's vast roster of challenging multi-phase boss encounters.
  • Non-linear progression. Stuck on a boss fight? Try another for a while.
  • Tired of not being able to replay a boss fight you enjoyed? In CORR, all boss fights can be replayed through memory shards.

CHARACTER PROGRESSION:

  • Acquire talismans to customize your character build with passive abilities.
  • Acquire unique berserk powers that can be activated during combat.
  • Collect ingredients and brew your own consumables.
  • Obtain hexes that increase the game's difficulty in unique ways in order to challenge yourself and obtain unique rewards.
  • Level up your character's stats.

STORY:

  • Piece together the events of the stagnant world by interpreting item descriptions, cryptic character dialogue, environmental storytelling, and more.
  • Includes branching NPC questlines.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2330260

data.name: Socket Fighters
data.detailed_description:
We are looking for help and a community for our new project:


Prepare to compete in the ultimate battle of home appliances! Socket Fighters is a 2D fighting game in which you can play against a friend or a bot in a one-on-one match. You can select your preferred appliance from a list that includes a washing machine, television, toaster, blender, vacuum cleaner, and more!

You can utilize basic strikes like kicks and punches in Socket Fighters, as well as five unique special attacks for each appliance. The washing machine, for example, can spit forth a sock, the television can fire a rainbow, the toaster can spew toast, and so on.

The game takes place in a domestic setting, with battles taking place in a variety of areas such as the kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, hallway, and basement. Each chamber has its own collection of active elements that you can use during a fight. You can, for example, destroy a cabinet to discover a concealed weapon or hurl a chair at your opponent to deal extra damage. Other ways to engage with the environment include throwing a knife into a fan to create a hazard.

In Socket Fighters, prepare to rule the domestic arena. Will you be crowned the ultimate household champion?

data.name: Ecstatic
data.detailed_description:
Control a disposable spider mech that shoots rockets out of its butt and decimate waves upon waves of drones synced to rave music, while also slowing down time whenever you stop moving. Pick up power-ups strategically and weave your way around enemies to make it to the end of the track!

Ecstatic is a unique experimental bullet-hell that promises tight action, fast choices, and sick tunes.

The game features 4 different difficulties, a slew of challenges, and includes a level editor that lets you use your own music tracks!

data.name: Bent Oak Island
data.detailed_description:
Twins Archer and Sam just want to relax after getting shipped off to stay with their eccentric uncle for the summer. Too bad for them the world is ending, and only they can stop it!



Bent Oak Island was once a bustling tourist hot spot, until a fire burned through the town square and turned everything to cinders. With the destruction of the town center, tourism dried up, and with it the main source of income for the island. Now 15 years later, the island has moved on, but is a shell of it's former self. The future of the island seems bleak, and to make matters worse, an air of dread has settled on the islanders. Ned at the diner is barely able to make ends meet after the paper factory shut its doors. The Captain swears the fish he catches are talking about him behind his back. A strange, hairy creature has been sighted stalking through the forests of the nature preserve. And Ted from the University on the mainland has measured the beginnings of disturbing tectonic activity- vibrations in the ground. The same activity that happened 15 years ago on the night of the fire.

Will Archer and Sam unravel the secrets of Bent Oak Island in time to save themselves from certain doom? Will Uncle finally be able to muster up the courage to ask out the head librarian? Will the pie shop ever actually have any pie in stock for people to eat? Find out the answers to these burning questions and much more by playing the game!



-Bent Oak Island follows the gameplay of classic point-and-click adventure games. In each scene there will be things to look at and interact with, items to collect, NPCs to talk to, and puzzles to solve.
-Gorgeous hand created pixel art, somewhere between NES and SNES graphics.
-Explore the island with main characters Archer and Sam, twins who get wrapped up in the island’s mysteries.
-A fully fleshed out world with deep lore that the player learns throughout the game. What starts out as a simple adventure turns into something much wilder and weirder!
-100+ different scenes with locations ranging from mountain peaks, to underground lakes, from abandoned factories, to townie bars!
-Two main endings, with a third secret ending that requires numerous optional puzzles to be completed.
-An estimated 3-6 hours of gameplay time across seven chapters. Unless you get stumped at a puzzle, then it's like, an infinite amount of gameplay time.

DEMO:

This game is a classic point and click adventure, so look at everything, talk to everyone, and try to figure out the puzzles! Right click changes your cursor, and the inventory can be found at the top of the screen. In the full game, combining inventory items will be necessary, but in the demo you won't have to worry about it! The demo is the first full chapter of the game, out of seven total.

PROTIP: Talk to your sister Sam on every screen, you never know if she will let you in on some island secrets, or maybe share a funny quip!






Song Information in video and demo:
{Bounce Ball, Old Bossa} by Twin Musicom (twinmusicom.org)

Deep in the abyss of the ocean lies an underwater kingdom full of color and joy. Dive into a submarine atmosphere complete with colorful graphics and exciting music, but keep an eye out! In the deepest darkest corners lie sunken ships and castles full of danger. Test your courage, complete tough but exciting levels and come back to the sunlight! * Use a variety of strategies to win
* Colorful ocean worlds to explore
* Relaxing and atmospheric music
* Play with no time limits

data.name: Pixel Art Academy: Learn Mode
data.detailed_description:
Pixel Art Academy is an educational game for learning how to draw. In Learn Mode, you jump straight into the game's interactive tutorials for the fastest way of becoming a pixel artist. After you learn how to use the basic drawing tools, you put theory into practice by first copying an existing pixel art sprite. When you've shown you got the hang of the tools, you get to create your own art by drawing sprites for a snake game—and then play your creation!

Learn by doing


Pixel Art Academy's interactive tutorials are designed for learning by doing. While there will be plenty of nerdy reading, all lessons are immediately followed by drawing what you've learned.

Test your knowledge


Before you move on, you want to make sure you understand what you've been learning. Pixel Art Academy uses formative assessment to identify gaps in knowledge so that you can apply further study and practice to build strong fundamentals.

Become a game artist


You can't be an artist by just copying other people's work. It's time to create your own art! In Pixel Art Academy, you will be working on various projects, most of them creating art for classic games such as snake, invaders, block breaker, and pinball creator.

Play your creations


Immediate feedback is very important. Start up the game and see how your sprites look in context. Then jump back to the canvas and immediately see your changes.

Future development


I've been working on Pixel Art Academy for almost a decade, building the game's engine, writing the story, and narrowing down the learning design. While the bigger adventure game that I have in mind is still far from complete, the game's educational core is ready to be shared with a wider audience. That's why I created Learn Mode, a standalone single-player version that includes just the polished learning content.

During the Early Access period, I will create tutorials, challenges, and projects that cover the major pixel art fundamentals (jaggies, dithering, and aliasing), applied to different areas (characters, environments, items). After this first course gets a full release, the development will continue to other areas (drawing from observation, perspective, shading …) as well as integration of the new content into the game's full Adventure Mode.
data.about_the_game:
Pixel Art Academy is an educational game for learning how to draw. In Learn Mode, you jump straight into the game's interactive tutorials for the fastest way of becoming a pixel artist. After you learn how to use the basic drawing tools, you put theory into practice by first copying an existing pixel art sprite. When you've shown you got the hang of the tools, you get to create your own art by drawing sprites for a snake game—and then play your creation!

Learn by doing


Pixel Art Academy's interactive tutorials are designed for learning by doing. While there will be plenty of nerdy reading, all lessons are immediately followed by drawing what you've learned.

Test your knowledge


Before you move on, you want to make sure you understand what you've been learning. Pixel Art Academy uses formative assessment to identify gaps in knowledge so that you can apply further study and practice to build strong fundamentals.

Become a game artist


You can't be an artist by just copying other people's work. It's time to create your own art! In Pixel Art Academy, you will be working on various projects, most of them creating art for classic games such as snake, invaders, block breaker, and pinball creator.

Play your creations


Immediate feedback is very important. Start up the game and see how your sprites look in context. Then jump back to the canvas and immediately see your changes.

Future development


I've been working on Pixel Art Academy for almost a decade, building the game's engine, writing the story, and narrowing down the learning design. While the bigger adventure game that I have in mind is still far from complete, the game's educational core is ready to be shared with a wider audience. That's why I created Learn Mode, a standalone single-player version that includes just the polished learning content.

During the Early Access period, I will create tutorials, challenges, and projects that cover the major pixel art fundamentals (jaggies, dithering, and aliasing), applied to different areas (characters, environments, items). After this first course gets a full release, the development will continue to other areas (drawing from observation, perspective, shading …) as well as integration of the new content into the game's full Adventure Mode.
data.short_description: Learn how to draw pixel art with a video game! Start from zero and develop your art skills as you become a game artist in real life. Complete interactive tutorials, draw pixel art sprites, and play the games you create. Everyone can do this!

data.name: Golf VS Zombies
data.detailed_description:
MORE FROM HYPERSTRANGE:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1587130/Blood_West/


Blood West is a stealth FPS inspired by the genre classics such as the Thief series (whose fans will be happy to hear the voice of Stephen Russell, the actor voicing the master-thief Garrett, returning here as the protagonist), S.T.A.L.K.E.R. games, or - from the contemporary catalog - Hunt: Showdown. The gameplay rewards the careful approach: scouting the area, stalking your enemies, and striking from the shadows. Can you figure out a way to clear a fort full of ghouls and monsters without raising an alarm?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1587130/Blood_West/


About the Game

Play alone, play with friends!

Frenemies. We mean frenemies. There are no friends in the post-apocalyptic, living dead-infested wasteland. So you might want to take your club, hit those courses, collect bottlecaps (what other currency did you expect? rupees?), and drive your golf cart through crowds of zombies for fun and profit. OR! Or you can invite up to 3 more people to a hilarious hot-seat golfing duel, treuel, or even quadruel, where survival is optional, but fun is unavoidable.

Swing easy and carry a big club

There is only so far your collection of clubs and balls gonna get you. Luckily, or not so, that weird guy has also survived and he has been tinkering on all sorts of things. Exploding and homing balls, sniper clubs™, drones, movement detectors and other wacky stuff. Too bad the guy accepts only bottle-caps as legal tender, but you are bound to find some - this is a wasteland afterall.

Bring your A-game

Up till now you had to deal with sand traps, tall grass, pools of water and that bloody wind, but times have changed and repeating a shot may be the least of your worries. Keep your head in the game and the dead… well dead - there is a record to set. Even better if you manage to grab some loot along the course.

data.name: Vom Drachentöten
data.detailed_description:
"Salutatio, Fremde!"
"Ihr habt erreicht uns're Oase."

Worum es geht


In der drückenden Wüstenhitze des Protektorats ziehen Drei aus, einen Drachen zu töten:
Nare Nivadh. Illum. Lambda des Morgens Rot. Ein jeder trägt eine eigene Motivation, eigene Erfahrungen, einen eigenen Konflikt in seinem Inneren. Und auch das Land selbst rumort unter der Tyrannei des Wurms ... Wissen, Waffen, Fertigkeiten: Nun gilt es, die Kraft zu finden, vor der sich selbst ein Drache beugt!

Wie es sich spielt


Ein textlastiges JRPG, reduziert auf seinen Kern.

  • Eine runde Geschichte. Etwa 4 Stunden, ganz ohne Sammelquests oder Grinding.
  • Erkundung mit Charakter. Eine lebendige Oase voller Geschichten. Ein ruiniertes Land uralter Geheimnisse, die es zu lüften gilt.
  • Fordernde Kämpfe. Jeder Charakter hat seine Rolle. Jede Aktion und jeder Erfahrungspunkt können entscheiden.
  • Taktik mit Effekt. Eine überschaubare Selektion an Fähigkeiten und Gegenständen, die es zu meistern gilt.
  • Konsequenzen. Jedes Risiko birgt Möglichkeiten ... und Gefahren!

Wie es entstanden ist


Dieses Erstlingswerk ist auch ein Experiment: Gelingt es, ein stilvolles, einnehmendes Rollenspiel nur mit den Ressourcen des RPG Maker MZ zu erschaffen? Um dieses Ziel zu erreichen, versucht sich das Spiel an einer ungewöhnlichen Sprache, inspiriert von den Dramen der Weimarer Klassik.

This game is only available in German, for now.

data.name: Heck City Delivery
data.detailed_description:
Overview:


Enter the world of Heck City, 20XX. As a delivery goblin, you'll dash through the city and surrounding wastelands, delivering food to the diverse inhabitants of the world. Blood powers technology and demons walk the earth, yet your hustle is eternal.

Surviving in Heck City will take quick wits and a strong work ethic. Will you rise to the top of the food chain, or will the city claim your soul too?

Key Features:


  • A fast-paced, high-octane experience inspired by classic arcade games like Crazy Taxi
  • A vibrant and diverse world to explore, filled with all sorts of colorful characters and wacky surprises
  • A cast of quirky and demanding customers, each with their own unique needs and preferences
  • A blood-powered car that lets you plow through obstacles and enemies alike, with bonus rewards for expert driving and zombie-smashing.
  • Groove to an upbeat, infectious soundtrack that will keep you engaged and energized.

data.name: BETON BRUTAL
data.detailed_description:
Climb the tower

BETON BRUTAL is a first person parkour game which tries to replicate and build upon the parkour mechanics seen in Minecraft.
Your goal is to climb a massive overgrown concrete tower which offers multiple stages of increasing difficulty.

Watch your step

Beware, a single misstep might cost you a lot of progress as there are no checkpoints whatsoever.
The course is however riddled with shortcuts which, when spotted, can save a lot of time and frustration.

Vertigo

If things get too stressful feel free to rest for a moment and take in your surroundings, just make sure to not peek over the edge too much.

Similar games to Little Kingdoms: Galcon, Mushroom Wars, and Eufloria.

data.name: Echoes of Somewhere: Series 1
data.detailed_description:
It is the year 2042, all of the human work has been replaced by AI powered robots. It is punishable by law for a human to perform ANY work.

The hard core criminal underworld is bustling with gangs and criminals selling illegal pastries, dressing hair in high security basement-salons and stealthy ninjas cleaning streets in the dark of the night.

Meanwhile, the upper echelon of people are imprisoned in their golden cages, unable to escape their lives of excess and absolute safety.

Echoes of Somewhere is a free, experimental 2.5D point and click adventure game anthology series developed by a group of game industry veterans on their free time.

Each episode in the series is about 1-4 hours of classic point-and-click gameplay in a new setting with new characters. The episodes will be released as free updates one by one when completed. Series 1 will take place in a dystopian future.

The project relies heavily on AI generated content and as such is an experiment in itself. The development progress is documented on the game's website. For good or for worse.

data.name: Bridge to Another World: Cursed Clouds
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Celestis, a breathtaking city of floating islands, friendly talking animals, tons of natural beauty, scenic vistas, and curious local characters. Unfortunately, your visit comes at a time when the local attractions also include a devastating curse, cluster earthquakes, and a massive, destructive serpent!
Your arrival, of course, was somewhat mysterious itself, and you may find that much about this world feels oddly familiar, but you’ll surely catch on quickly with the helpful fox as your guide! After all, it’s up to you to unravel a great mystery and save the city in the sky in this all-new Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

• Search tons of breathtaking hidden-object scenes!
• Beautiful original artwork!
• Explore a world of mystery and surprises!
• Gorgeous soundtrack!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

data.name: Camplandia
data.detailed_description:
The Ultimate Summer Camp Builder Management Sim

Welcome to Camplandia! In this charming 2D builder game, you are charged with creating and managing your very own summer camp. From crafting the perfect cabins to organizing fun activities for your campers, every decision you make will determine the success of your camp.



Build a thriving summer camp.

Start by designing and constructing your camp's essential facilities, including dorms, kitchens, washrooms, and more. As you build your camp, you'll need to keep your campers happy and entertained with a variety of fun activities, such as canoeing, fishing, and crafting. Make sure to hire staff members to assist with maintenance, cooking, and other tasks to keep your camp running smoothly.



Bring your dream summer camp to life in this immersive simulation game.

As you progress through the game, you'll unlock new buildings, activities, and upgrades to enhance your camp and increase its reputation. With colorful pixel art graphics and a fun and relaxing atmosphere, Camplandia is the perfect way to escape into a virtual summer vacation.



To Summerize...

  • Construct buildings to use as dorms, kitchens, washrooms, or other camp facilities
  • Hire camp leaders, cooks, and medical & maintenance staff
  • Provide fun activities for the campers, such as fishing, canoeing, crafting, and more
  • Customize and decorate your camp with a large variety of items and possibilities
  • Earn profits and reputation to unlock new facilities and camp activities and grow your summer camp

So what are you waiting for? Build the Summer Camp of your dreams!

"Pathfinder 2 RPG - Treasure Vault



Venture into the Vault!

Pathfinder Treasure Vault reveals the glittering hoard of a terrifying dragon, as presented by the creature's plucky kobold assistant. This 224-page hardcover rulebook presents a catalog of new gear from nearly every category of equipment and magic item available in the Pathfinder RPG while also introducing entirely new categories of items as well. Give your character the perfect tool for the job with signature weapons, customizable relics, and wondrous items to fit your every need while preparing for any eventuality with potions, elixirs, wands, and more!
Each chamber of the dragon's vault contains a mountain of treasure, from deadly new weapons and forgotten suits of armor to mysterious alchemical items and deadly poisons. There is something in the vault for everyone, including:
  • Nearly 600 new items spread across numerous equipment types.
  • Over 50 new weapons, such as the devastating earthbreaker hammer and the ferocious falcata.
  • New shields and armor, from wooden breastplates for druids to the magical starfall shield that turns you into a living comet!
  • An entire chapter, "Alchemy Unleashed," that introduces over 100 new alchemical items, covering everything from restorative lozenges to searing flamethrowers.
  • New magic items of all shapes and sizes, from magical tattoos to artifacts like the goddess Shelyn's mighty glaive, the Whisperer of Souls.
  • An entire chapter of new, variant, and expanded crafting rules.
  • New categories of items that can give you power that comes at a dangerous price.
This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and features the following additions:
  • Includes a Fantasy Grounds reference manual providing all of the guidebook content
  • Integrated automation to make using the new features even easier
  • Evocative artwork
"

data.name: Veni, Vidi, Vici
data.detailed_description:
Enter the Land of Ardera

Play as Delphine as she tries to piece together her memories and figure out what happened to the Arderan people.

Borrow power from strange creatures and dance your way to victory

Engage Tenants in rhythm-based dance battles to rid them of corruption and gain their trust. Switch between unlocked tenants on the fly to develop your own mixture of dance styles.

Explore the ruins of a once-great civilization on a quest of revival and redemption

Use the abilities of alpha Tenants to navigate the puzzle-filled halls of the Temple of the Three Virtues.

Uncover the secrets of a past better left forgotten

  • 9 tenants to fight and partner with, each with their own set of moves
  • Swap between 3 tenants at once to create versatile move sets
  • 3 temple wings to explore, each modeled after their own Arderan virtue
  • Restore the fallen deities of each temple wing in intense boss battles

data.name: Dawn of the Monsters: Arcade + Character DLC Pack
data.detailed_description:
The kaiju conflict continues with the Arcade + Character DLC Pack! This add-on content for Dawn of the Monsters lets you fight the Nephilim hordes in a whole new way with the remixed action of Arcade Mode; this pick-up-and-play mode features a new power-up system (with "classic" and "rogue" options), revamped scoring, unlockable Nightmare difficulty, and new ending illustrations. Also included in this DLC is new playable character Meteor Temujin! Chosen by fan vote, this combining mecha wields three devastating weapons - a sword, an axe, and a hammer - to obliterate enemies in any game mode! Additionally, this expansion delivers 50 new character skins, extra gallery entries, three new archive files, and new challenges & achievements. The titanic battle rages on!

Contents:
• Arcade Mode
◦ New power-up system with two options: classic (choose from a predetermined set) or rogue (randomly generated)
◦ Revamped scoring
◦ Countdown timer
◦ Normal and Nightmare difficulties
◦ Five unlockable ending illustrations
• New playable character Meteor Temujin
• 50 new character skins (18 for Meteor Temujin, 8 each for Megadon, Ganira, Aegis Prime, and Tempest Galahad)
• New gallery items
• Three new archive files
• New challenges and achievements

*The full Dawn of the Monsters game (available separately) is required to use this content.

data.name: Sexy room
data.detailed_description:
💟Add in WishList!!💟

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2311810


About the Game

Sexy Room


💟Li Ruoli💟
She was your senior in T University, aged 29. After years of separation, you meet her again in the workplace. During your school days, you were inseparable, whether it was during classes or leisure time, her presence was almost always around. However, just before graduation, she suddenly lost contact, and it was only after many years that you accidentally discovered that you were both working in the same film and television company. Unfortunately, she was already married...


💟God's prank or gift?💟
Just when you were feeling hopeless, you and your senior were sent by the God to the "room where you cannot leave without having sex". The rules here are exactly as they sound, you can only leave if you have sex, otherwise, you will be imprisoned forever. Under the mental pressure of being imprisoned, you and your senior got involved. You thought it would end there, but from that day on, God would send you back to that room every single day. Is this God's prank or a response to your wishes?

💟A love affair that challenges morality and taboo💟
After that, you and your senior continuously convinced yourselves that your relationship only existed in that room. Once you returned to reality, you should pretend that nothing had happened and continue with your separate lives. However, the human heart is not that easy to separate. You keep struggling with the moral dilemma, and gradually, you become unable to distinguish the boundaries between yourselves. You engage in taboo sexual acts and develop indescribable emotions towards each other.

💟Detailed textual descriptions, a visual novel game💟
Within the limited time given by God, capture your senior's heart. Don't regret it and try your best. The delicate text is written by the master of both genders, Kris, and it will immerse you in a forbidden love affair.



💟Experience ultimate satisfaction with exquisitely detailed CGs!💟
The game features incredibly detailed artwork that will provide you with a visually luxurious feast.

data.name: Desktop Soccer 2
data.detailed_description:
Turn your desk into a soccer field!
You won't be able to put down this easy-to-play game!

Not only can you customize your team formation and player positions, you can even give your players unique appearances in Style Settings!
Change up their signature move by equipping them with different items!
Create your own unique dream team!

The World Cup awaits! Shoot for the top!

[Practice Match]
Practice on your own or watch demo matches between CPU players.

[Friendly Match]
Play with up to four players.
Take your pick between playing in 3-on-1 matches or 2-on-2 matches.
You can choose whoever you want on your team!
Enjoy all sorts of fun matches.

[Team Selection]
Customize everything from your players' names, formation, and numbers in the system settings.
You can even change up their hairstyle, eye color, and spikes! The sky's the limit!

[Tournament]
Take part in fierce competitions.
Train your team up, perfect your techniques, and aim for first place in the World Cup!

[Capsule FK]
Use the points you earn in matches to get new power-up items and formations.

[Mini Game]
Seize your chance to net loads of points by hitting the target!
Line up your shot and reap the rewards.

*A controller is required for local multiplayer.

data.name: Vampire Memories - 吸血鬼的回忆
data.detailed_description:
--------------------------------------
Introduction to the game
--------------------------------------

This is a STG (barrage shooting) type of game called Vampire memories. In this game, you will control the character to participate in flight shooting, defeat the enemy and their on-screen comment. Different from the traditional STG game, this game is characterized by the mutual elimination of bullets, players can destroy the enemy's bullets to protect themselves, thus reducing the difficulty and giving a small sense of relief.

The game is easy to operate, through the up and down keys to move, select the menu, enter key to confirm, use A, S, D, F, Z, X, C, V and other keys for skills and attack operations. The game supports the handle, and plans to introduce the function of Steam Creative Workshop, so that players can freely develop Mod.

Although the game has not yet been developed, developers will regularly update the store page information to provide more new content at different stages of game development. If you are interested in this game, you can express your ideas to the developer through the following email. Please note that developers may use translation software to read and reply to emails, so in case of offense caused by translation errors, please forgive me.
Developer email address:
queengames@qq.com

--------------------------------------
The current development status of this game.
--------------------------------------


Q: what do you need to pay special attention to in this question and answer?
A: all languages in different countries are translated by AI; there is only one developer of the game who does not speak any language other than Chinese, so all the other languages indicated on the game interface are translated using AI.

Q: what kind of game is this?
A: it's a STG, on-screen shooting game; it's a relatively simple game.

Q: this is a STG on-screen shooting game. Why is it a relatively simple game?
A: bullets cancel each other as a feature of the game, because it can destroy the enemy's bullets, so unlike the traditional STG on-screen shooting game, it needs to avoid the enemy's bullets to the limit; on the other hand, because the bullets collide with each other and destroy each other, there will be a small decompression effect.

Q: do you have a live demo video of the game?
A: in this store page, the developer's platform account is written, and there are some demo videos uploaded by developers. You can take a look.

---- [2023-1211] ----


Q: it has been said before that it may incorporate the element of "vampire survivor". Has this policy not changed yet?
A: It can't be said that it will be integrated into it. This is a consideration at that time; it can't be regarded as a policy. At present, I think if I can integrate it into the system healthily, I want to do it. Now it still depends on how the overall game development will be.

Q: it was said before that it would be fascinating to see the game "Arrow Sword". Do you still intend to continue to quote the flow of the game "Arrow Sword"?
A: at that time, I thought that this game mode might be very healthy, easy to use and fun. I'm still not sure. It depends on the research and development of the game. However, I still think that the mode of Arrow and Sword seems to be very suitable for the current research and development of this game.

Q: tell me more about the skills of the character.
A: at present, the core process is still under development, and when the core process is determined, we can begin to introduce skills.

This week's diary:
1. I was busy updating this week, so I came back to think that when I wrote this log, it was 01:00 on the evening of December 11th.
two。 For example, there are still 20 days left at the end of December. I hope to improve a minimum trial version before then.

--------------------------------------
Game operation
--------------------------------------


Q: how does the character move?
A: up and down the left and right keys to move

Q: how to operate the menu?
A: up and down the left and right direction keys to select
A: enter key to confirm

Q: how do you operate skills and attacks?
A: operate A, S, D, F, Z, X, C, V of the keyboard
A: these eight keys are located in the lower left corner of the keyboard and are easy to identify.

Q: is there any saying that a key has a specific usage?
A: Z button, designed to accelerate the movement of a character
A: X keys, designed for basic attacks on characters
A: C button, designed for melee attacks by characters
A: v buttons, designed to slow down the movement of a character
A: a button, designed for the release of skill 1 of the character
A: s button, designed for the release of the character's skill 2
A: d button, designed for the release of the character's skill 3
A: F button, designed for the release of a character's skill 4

--------------------------------------
Developer's platform account:
--------------------------------------

bilibili： 8045197

--------------------------------------
Historical information
--------------------------------------

---- [2023-1203] ----


Will QRV be available for trial in December?
A: I'm doing it, and I'm already in the development of the trial version. It is uncertain whether it will be available within December.

This week's diary:
1. Officially entered the research and development of the trial version, and began to slowly fill in the missing parts, and the functions required by the trial version are gradually improving.
two。 This week, I was busy developing the trial version, and when I looked back, it was all the research and development needed for the trial version, but the progress was mediocre at first glance; maybe that's what the game development actually is.
3. All in all, it is hoped that the trial version will be officially completed within December.

---- [2023-1126] ----


Q: there has been a lot of talk about WORKSHOP recently. Is it very easy to make Mod for this game?
A: not necessarily. Developers have just improved the function of updating the created Mod to the creative workshop (WORKSHOP) more easily. Players also need to be familiar with the production method of Mod before they can make Mod and upload it to the creative workshop (WORKSHOP) for use.

This week's diary:
1. This week is mainly to start the official development of the Demo version.
two。 Since the basic work is done, the next focus is on completing the Demo version.
3. Originally expected to complete the Demo version within 12 months, according to the current progress can only be said to barely catch up; finally, it depends on whether the actual development progress is smooth.

---- [2023-1120] ----


This week's diary:
1. The update is late again. I should have sent this update diary yesterday, but I forgot it because I was too busy.
two。 As I've been busy lately, I'm going to simply write an update log this week.
3. First of all, due to the completion of the first phase of the code last week, we can finally concentrate on continuing development this week; after a week of busy work, the item updates (ITEM UPDATE, ITEM CREATE) of the Creative Workshop (WORKSHOP) in the game have been successfully completed!
4. So, up to now, it can be said that the game has the minimum function that allows players to use the Creative Workshop (WORKSHOP).
5. That's all for this week's update log. Due to solving the impact of the Unity incident, we may be more busy with the development of the game, hoping to improve the trial version of the game as soon as possible.
6. The item update demonstration about WORKSHOP is also posted in the video of the author's platform account. If you are interested, you can take a look.

---- [2023-1112] ----


This week's diary:
1. Simply write a diary this week
two。 First of all, the first phase of code improvement has been initially completed; the following can continue with the progress made on September 13; that is, from the day Unity issued the announcement, two months have been spent on rectifying the internal code; to make it as far as possible to divest Unity; until today, the first phase of divestiture is finally over.
3. To this end, the development work that has stalled since September 13 can finally continue.
4. Tired of doing this first phase of code research and development work this week, I still haven't collected some question and answer information; however, as long as the code improvement work goes smoothly, it feels like the whole game project is going smoothly. Everything is acceptable.
5. Finally, let's sum up this week; one is that the game development work, which has been stagnant for two months, can finally begin; and the other is that this time the code took two months.

---- [2023-1105] ----


Q: when would you like to get a more specific version of Demo?
A: there is no way to be specific. It can only be decided according to whether the development is smooth or not, but you can give an irresponsible premonition that it may be December, and if not, it will be in January.

This week's diary:
1. I haven't collected many Q & A sessions this week, so just keep a simple diary.

data.about_the_game:
--------------------------------------
Introduction to the game
--------------------------------------

This is a STG (barrage shooting) type of game called Vampire memories. In this game, you will control the character to participate in flight shooting, defeat the enemy and their on-screen comment. Different from the traditional STG game, this game is characterized by the mutual elimination of bullets, players can destroy the enemy's bullets to protect themselves, thus reducing the difficulty and giving a small sense of relief.

The game is easy to operate, through the up and down keys to move, select the menu, enter key to confirm, use A, S, D, F, Z, X, C, V and other keys for skills and attack operations. The game supports the handle, and plans to introduce the function of Steam Creative Workshop, so that players can freely develop Mod.

Although the game has not yet been developed, developers will regularly update the store page information to provide more new content at different stages of game development. If you are interested in this game, you can express your ideas to the developer through the following email. Please note that developers may use translation software to read and reply to emails, so in case of offense caused by translation errors, please forgive me.
Developer email address:
queengames@qq.com

--------------------------------------
The current development status of this game.
--------------------------------------


Q: what do you need to pay special attention to in this question and answer?
A: all languages in different countries are translated by AI; there is only one developer of the game who does not speak any language other than Chinese, so all the other languages indicated on the game interface are translated using AI.

Q: what kind of game is this?
A: it's a STG, on-screen shooting game; it's a relatively simple game.

Q: this is a STG on-screen shooting game. Why is it a relatively simple game?
A: bullets cancel each other as a feature of the game, because it can destroy the enemy's bullets, so unlike the traditional STG on-screen shooting game, it needs to avoid the enemy's bullets to the limit; on the other hand, because the bullets collide with each other and destroy each other, there will be a small decompression effect.

Q: do you have a live demo video of the game?
A: in this store page, the developer's platform account is written, and there are some demo videos uploaded by developers. You can take a look.

---- [2023-1211] ----


Q: it has been said before that it may incorporate the element of "vampire survivor". Has this policy not changed yet?
A: It can't be said that it will be integrated into it. This is a consideration at that time; it can't be regarded as a policy. At present, I think if I can integrate it into the system healthily, I want to do it. Now it still depends on how the overall game development will be.

Q: it was said before that it would be fascinating to see the game "Arrow Sword". Do you still intend to continue to quote the flow of the game "Arrow Sword"?
A: at that time, I thought that this game mode might be very healthy, easy to use and fun. I'm still not sure. It depends on the research and development of the game. However, I still think that the mode of Arrow and Sword seems to be very suitable for the current research and development of this game.

Q: tell me more about the skills of the character.
A: at present, the core process is still under development, and when the core process is determined, we can begin to introduce skills.

This week's diary:
1. I was busy updating this week, so I came back to think that when I wrote this log, it was 01:00 on the evening of December 11th.
two。 For example, there are still 20 days left at the end of December. I hope to improve a minimum trial version before then.

--------------------------------------
Game operation
--------------------------------------


Q: how does the character move?
A: up and down the left and right keys to move

Q: how to operate the menu?
A: up and down the left and right direction keys to select
A: enter key to confirm

Q: how do you operate skills and attacks?
A: operate A, S, D, F, Z, X, C, V of the keyboard
A: these eight keys are located in the lower left corner of the keyboard and are easy to identify.

Q: is there any saying that a key has a specific usage?
A: Z button, designed to accelerate the movement of a character
A: X keys, designed for basic attacks on characters
A: C button, designed for melee attacks by characters
A: v buttons, designed to slow down the movement of a character
A: a button, designed for the release of skill 1 of the character
A: s button, designed for the release of the character's skill 2
A: d button, designed for the release of the character's skill 3

data.short_description: This is a STG (barrage shooting) type of game. In this game, you will control the character to participate in flight shooting, defeat the enemy and their on-screen comment. Unlike the traditional STG game, this game is characterized by the fact that bullets can eliminate each other.

data.name: Away To The Stars
data.detailed_description:
Away to the Stars invites you to step into the shoes of Max, a survivor on a desolate Earth abandoned by humanity. With your forgotten past and newfound extraordinary abilities, embark on a mission to reshape the destiny of humanity on Gaia.

As you explore an expansive universe, survival, combat, exploration, and personalization intertwine to offer a gaming experience like no other.



Key Features:

  • Explore a Massive Universe: Traverse 1,000,000 procedurally generated planets across 5 captivating galaxies. Each journey promises new discoveries, adventures, and challenges.
  • Engage in Exciting Combat: Battle hostile forces, commandeer pirate ships, and customize your arsenal with unique procedurally generated weapons.
  • Survival and Resource Management: Ensure your survival in an unforgiving world by managing your sleep, hunger, health, and energy levels.
  • Travel in Style: Pilot your ship across galaxies and speed through vast planetary landscapes on hover bikes.



  • Unlock Mysteries and Obtain New Ships: Solve ancient puzzles, enhance your stats, and acquire new vessels for your explorations.
  • Shape Your Living Spaces: Settle on planets and shape your desired living spaces with creative customization options. Trade real estate based on fluctuating market trends.
  • Complex Dialog System: Engage with diverse species, each with unique stories to tell, fostering meaningful connections and relationships.



  • Personalize Your Spaceship: Customize your spaceship's interior, not only for aesthetics but to gain an edge in off-planet combat.
  • Evocative Narrative: Dive into a narrative that evolves with every decision you make, a story that transcends even death.

Get ready to rediscover humanity's potential in the distant stars. The future of Gaia lies in your hands. Are you ready for the adventure?

data.name: Super Cambur The Sacred Orbs
data.detailed_description:
WHAT IS SUPER CAMBUR THE SACRED ORBS?:

Super Cambur is a classic RPG videogame, you can play with the keyboard, mouse or gamepad. You will have to advance through the maps to discover the story of the game, depending on the area in which you are, you will enter into random battles, in which you will have to select the combination of attacks based on your strategy to be victorious. You also have the option to improve your heroes withnew gear and upgrade skills or lear new magic spells.

Are you ready to go on an old school retro adventure?




STORY OF SUPER CAMBUR THE SACRED ORBS:

Super Cambur is on a mission to retrieve the four sacred orbs in order to restore peace to his land. He must travel through treacherous lands and face powerful foes in order to complete his quest. With courage and determination, Super Cambur embarks on an epic journey to retrieve the sacred orbs and restore peace to his kingdom.


KEY FEATURES:

►Journey through the world of Super Cambur and explore each of its corners in your quest for notoriety, wealth and recognition.



►Explore vibrant villages, abandoned mines, deserted camps, Dugeons and more as you unravel the history of the 4 Sacred Orbs.



►Universally updated 2D pixel graphics.

►Beautifully soundtrack in a faithful Super Cambur style by original composer Filippo Vicarelli.

►Classic RPG Gameplay in a new pixel/comic world



►Modernized UI, auto-battle options, and more!



Join forces with Super Cambur and prepare to save the multiverse in this classic RPG adventure!

data.name: Electrician Simulator - Smart Devices
data.detailed_description:
• Electrician Simulator goes Smart!
Plenty of new missions to complete - visit the houses of your past clients and improve their lifestyle with smart devices!



  • Think outside the... socket?
Open your mind and un-wire your home with motion sensors, digital switches, and colorful bulbs! Wireless mechanics change way you think about your tasks and challenges.



  • New workshop challenges.
Diagnose and fix smart-themed devices. 6 completly new smart gadgets are ready to be dissasembled on the workbench!



  • Endless mode extention!
All new content extends previously added Endless mode with new mission items and tasks!
